definition: still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else

sentences.english: Assuming the US pays back the debt, China will be richer.
sentences.chinese: 假如美國償還債務，中國將因此更加富有。

sentences.english: Du chopped the losing responsibility to jade lute, forced jade lute to raise money to pay his debts.
sentences.chinese: 杜茸把輸錢的責任推到玉琴身上，迫玉琴籌錢還債。

sentences.english: “But now I gotta pay, ” he said.
Golden flowers to the food factory jobs, what accidentally met the directors son.
sentences.chinese: 金花到食品廠打工還債，偶然結識了廠長的兒子楊帆。

sentences.english: Payment by this method relies on the co-operation of the creditor and the enforcement officer.
sentences.chinese: 這種還債方式依賴於債權人和執行官員間的合作。

sentences.english: Both Italy and Spain insist they can service their debt.
sentences.chinese: 意大利和西班牙堅稱自己能償還債務。

sentences.english: His employer garnished his wages in order to pay his debt.
sentences.chinese: 他的僱主扣發他的工資還債。

sentences.english: If you can't pay your debts, debase your currency.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不能還債，那就把降低幣值。

sentences.english: Paying its debts defunded the firm's operating budget.
sentences.chinese: 還債耗盡了該公司的營業收支預算。

sentences.english: Take that half that you would have been using to pay off debts and apply them to your long-term goals as you see fit.
sentences.chinese: 把你計劃償還債務的那一半投入到你的長遠目標上。

sentences.english: Sometimes this means providing loans so governments can meet debt payments.
sentences.chinese: 有些是要這意味着要提供貸款以保證借款國償還債務。

sentences.english: She is in order to pay for his father to himself into the kiln.
sentences.chinese: 她是爲了給自己父親還債自己把自己賣進窯子的。

sentences.english: He remembered his deposit in the Western Savings Band and Roti's promise to repay.
sentences.chinese: 他想起他在西方儲蓄銀行的存款和羅迪還債的諾言。

sentences.english: For in time for the son of debt, making money to persuade Chen.
sentences.chinese: 欣兒爲爭取出演時機賺錢還債，前去勸說陳超。

sentences.english: From this day onwards, you have to be gigolo for three months.
sentences.chinese: 你呀從現在開始，給我做三個月男妓來還債。

sentences.english: Mr. Obama's address comes just a week before the country is set to run out of money to pay its bills.
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬的講話距美國無錢還債的日子僅有一週的時間。

definition: to owe a debt/the sum owed
to support a family/to raise a family
to involve/to implicate sb/to spread to others (harm, trouble, damage etc)
